ygData.subject: Re: Can anyone share befallen info
ygData.msgSnippet: PF the easiet for bronze, unless you want to go mistmoore
ygData.messageBody:
PF the easiet for bronze, unless you want to go mistmoore

>

> stuffs and easy to hunt for lvl 20s?
